forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
